instruction: In an undirected dynamic graph, (u, v, t) means that node u and node v are linked with an undirected edge at time t.Your task is to answer when when the three given nodes first form a closed triad. two nodes with a common neighbor are said to have a triadic closure, if they are linked since some time so that the three nodes have linked with each other to form a triad.
input: Given an undirected dynamic graph with the edges [(0, 1, 2), (0, 2, 3), (0, 3, 2), (0, 4, 1)]. When are node 0,3 and 1 first close the triad? Give the answer as an integer number at the last of your response after 'Answer:'If the answer does not exist, please respond with 'Answer: -1'.

instruction: In an undirected dynamic graph, (u, v, t) means that node u and node v are linked with an undirected edge at time t.Your task is to answer when when the three given nodes first form a closed triad. two nodes with a common neighbor are said to have a triadic closure, if they are linked since some time so that the three nodes have linked with each other to form a triad.
input: Given an undirected dynamic graph with the edges [(0, 1, 2), (0, 2, 3), (0, 3, 2), (0, 4, 1)]. When are node 2,0 and 4 first close the triad? Give the answer as an integer number at the last of your response after 'Answer:'If the answer does not exist, please respond with 'Answer: -1'.
